name: WhatAreTheOdds
0:
”Alexa, ask Prediction Markets Today to tell me about the midterm elections.”
”Alexa, ask Prediction Markets Today to look up Elizabeth Warren.”
”Alexa, ask Prediction Markets Today about the probability of the Trump impeachment.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: prediction markets today
des: This unofficial skill will tell you how some predictions on the PredictIt prediction marketplace are doing. You may be surprised at how likely some of these events are predicted to be!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
